results.odor: Fresh citrus top notes, bright and clean, with slight green undertones
results.benchmarkComments: Outperforms current standard in initial impact. Similar longevity.

results.odor: Woody base with amber notes, warm and rounded character
results.benchmarkComments: Comparable to benchmark B. More natural feel.

results.odor: Floral heart, rose and jasmine dominant, elegant and refined
results.benchmarkComments: Superior to current floral standard. Excellent balance.
